april.jmat
Class Vec

java.lang.Object
  april.jmat.Vec
Direct Known Subclasses:
CSRVec, DenseVec
public abstract class Vec
extends java.lang.Object

Base type of all vectors (both sparse and dense).

Method Detail

getDoubles

public abstract double[] getDoubles()
Return an array corresponding to the vector's elements. This may or may not be the internal representation of the vector, so callers should not modify this array.

public abstract Vec copy(int i0,
                         int i1)
create a new, smaller vector beginning at element i0, going through i1 (inclusive). The length of this vector will be i1-i0+1.

transposeAsColumn

public abstract void transposeAsColumn(Matrix A,
                                       int col)
Insert this vector as column 'col' in matrix A. The column is initially all zero. The vector should iterate through its elements, calling the matrix's set method.

transposeAsColumn

public abstract void transposeAsColumn(Matrix A,
                                       int col,
                                       int i0,
                                       int i1)
Transpose only the elements at indices [i0,i1] inclusive.

Add this vector (scaled) to another vector. This vector is unchanged.
